title: SL vs SA Tests, where to watch live: TV channels and live streaming for Sri Lanka tour of South Africa
description: South Africa and Sri Lanka will play two Tests as part of the World Test Championship: here's where to watch the matches live on TV channels and live streaming networks.
author: Aadya Sharma
excerpt: South Africa and Sri Lanka will play two Tests as part of the World Test Championship: here's where to watch the matches live on TV channels and live streaming networks.
text: South Africa and Sri Lanka will play two Tests as part of the World Test Championship: here's where to watch the matches live on TV channels and live streaming networks. There's likely to be rain at least on the first day in Durban, which would bother Sri Lanka, currently placed third in the WTC cycle. South Africa are placed fifth, but are also in the hunt, making this series a qualifier of sorts to the main event. South Africa have confirmed their XI, with regular captain Temba Bavuma making his return. Date: Starting November 27, 9.30am local time Venue: Kingsmead, Durban SL vs SA, where to watch live: TV channels and live streaming Where to watch live in Sri Lanka The Tests will be live on Dialog Television on ThePapare TV (Ch No 63) or ThePapare TV HD (Ch No 126), as well as the Dialog ViU app. Where to watch live in South Africa The Tests will be shown live on the SuperSport network: SS Cricket and SS Grandstand, with commentary in English, Afrikaans and isiXhosa Where to watch live in India The Tests will be live on Sport18 and Sports18 HD Follow Wisden for all cricket updates, including live scores, match stats, quizzes and more. Stay up to date with the latest cricket news, player updates, team standings, match highlights, video analysis and live match odds.
html:
South Africa and Sri Lanka will play two Tests as part of the World Test Championship: here's where to watch the matches live on TV channels and live streaming networks.

There's likely to be rain at least on the first day in Durban, which would bother Sri Lanka, currently placed third in the WTC cycle. South Africa are placed fifth, but are also in the hunt, making this series a qualifier of sorts to the main event. South Africa have confirmed their XI, with regular captain Temba Bavuma making his return.

Date: Starting November 27, 9.30am local time

Venue: Kingsmead, Durban

SL vs SA, where to watch live: TV channels and live streaming

Where to watch live in Sri Lanka

The Tests will be live on Dialog Television on ThePapare TV (Ch No 63) or ThePapare TV HD (Ch No 126), as well as the Dialog ViU app.

Where to watch live in South Africa

The Tests will be shown live on the SuperSport network: SS Cricket and SS Grandstand, with commentary in English, Afrikaans and isiXhosa

Where to watch live in India

The Tests will be live on Sport18 and Sports18 HD

Follow Wisden for all cricket updates, including live scores, match stats, quizzes and more. Stay up to date with the latest cricket news, player updates, team standings, match highlights, video analysis and live match odds.
